summary: Website to be built based on the user's uploaded design image, aiming to match the layout/styling; will use static placeholder images and a non-functional (mock) "Generate" button.
architectural_notes: Implement site as a static front-end with placeholder assets; no external AI image generation integration.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dark cinematic abstract background with deep charcoal base and subtle crimson glow haze (bg-hero.dim_1600x2400.png)
- Abstract futuristic panel texture with soft vignette and faint circuit-like patterns (panel-texture.dim_1600x900.png)
- Six neutral non-person gallery images: moody cinematic AI-themed abstracts/landscapes, each with low-key lighting and warm highlights (gallery-01.dim_900x1200.png)
- Six neutral non-person gallery images: moody cinematic AI-themed abstracts/landscapes, each with low-key lighting and warm highlights (gallery-02.dim_900x1200.png)
- Six neutral non-person gallery images: moody cinematic AI-themed abstracts/landscapes, each with low-key lighting and warm highlights (gallery-03.dim_900x1200.png)
- Six neutral non-person gallery images: moody cinematic AI-themed abstracts/landscapes, each with low-key lighting and warm highlights (gallery-04.dim_900x1200.png)
- Six neutral non-person gallery images: moody cinematic AI-themed abstracts/landscapes, each with low-key lighting and warm highlights (gallery-05.dim_900x1200.png)
- Six neutral non-person gallery images: moody cinematic AI-themed abstracts/landscapes, each with low-key lighting and warm highlights (gallery-06.dim_900x1200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page website that closely replicates the layout, typography, and visual styling of the uploaded design image (grok_image_xg2a6g3.jpg), including: top navigation bar, hero section with large title, prompt input section with a Generate button, and a Gallery grid section.
Implement the top navigation UI from the design with links: Home, Gallery, Pricing, Contact (and decorative icons if present), and provide smooth-scroll behavior to corresponding page sections.

Build the prompt input section ("Enter your description here...") with a text input and a mock/non-AI "Generate" button. When clicked, show a brief loading state and then add a new placeholder image card to the gallery using a pre-generated static asset (no external AI APIs).

Create a Gallery section that visually matches the design: a section title, an optional style/filter dropdown (e.g., "Dramatic"), and a grid of image cards with consistent aspect ratio, rounded corners, and hover/focus styling.

Replace any photos of real people from the uploaded design with neutral, non-person placeholder imagery (e.g., abstract AI-themed art, futuristic textures, landscapes) while keeping the same layout composition.

Establish and apply a coherent visual theme consistent with the uploaded design: dark charcoal/black surfaces, deep crimson accents, subtle glow/highlight treatments, and elegant serif headline typography paired with a readable sans-serif for body text. Apply consistently across all sections.
Add a simple Pricing section and Contact section (as linked from the nav) that match the site theme and provide complete, polished content placeholders in English.
Add generated static image assets to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the hero and gallery sections.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a full website matching the uploaded design image (layout/styling replication).
Use static placeholder images for the gallery/people photos instead of reusing exact images from the design.
Include a non-functional/mock "Generate" button (no real image generation).
